alert.note: Alert for West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 30 at 10:44AM MST until December 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM FRIDAY TO 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches, up to 6 inches for Marias Pass. * WHERE...West Glacier Region. * WHEN...From 11 AM Friday to 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
